appendix.title: VMWare ESX Installation Instructions
appendix.para: &cloud; does not directly support VMware ESX, but rather delegates requests to an existing vCenter Server. Enabling VMWare ESX support in &cloud; requires to prepare the vCenter Server and to install the VMWare SDK on the &compnode;.

sect1.title: Preparing the VMWare vCenter Server
sect1.para: &cloud; requires the VMWare vCenter server to run version 5.1 or better. You need to create a datacenter for &cloud;:

step.para: Log into the vCenter Server using the vSphere Web Client
Choose Hosts and Clusters and create a Datacenter
Set up a New Cluster which has DRS enabled.
Set Automation Level to Fully Automated and Migration Threshold to Aggressive.
Add ESXi hosts to the cluster.

sect1.title: Finishing the esxi &compnode; Installation
